comments:
Description:
NPE when re-preview the report in new preview prototype.
Build number:2.2.0.v20070531

Steps to reproduce:
1. New two labels, set toc as toc1, toc2 for them.
2. Preview in new preview prototype, click toc2.
3. Back to Layout and click preview in new preview prototype again.

Expected result:
Preview is ok without exception.

Actual result:
NPE.

Error log:
